ARABIC: ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلْءَاخِرَةِ هُمْ كَٰفِرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who do not pay zakat and reject the Next World.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who do not give a due share of their wealth for the welfare of others, and do not believe in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: who do not pay Zakah, and who deny the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Woe to the pagans, who do not pay zakat and have no faith in the life to come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who do not give the obligatory charity, and who deny the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those who give not the Zakah and they are disbelievers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: (To) those who do not give poor-rate and they are unbelievers in the hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who pay not the alms, and disbelieve in the world to come.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who give not the poor-due, and who are disbelievers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who do not pay the zakat, and who deny the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Who give not the poor-rate; and they! in the Hereafter, they are disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: —those who do not pay the zakat and disbelieve in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who practise not regular Charity, and who even deny the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those who give not the Zakat and they are disbelievers in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who do not pay charity and disbelieve in the Everlasting Life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who do not pay the alms; and regarding the Hereafter, they are disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those who do not give zakah, and in the Hereafter they are disbelievers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [41:7] who do not pay the alms and who are disbelievers in the Hereafter ([the repetition of] hum, ‘they’, is for emphasis).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who give not the poor-due) they do not testify that there is no deity except Allah, (and who are disbelievers in) deniers of (the Hereafter) resurrection after death, and Paradise and hell.
